payload.content: To set up ClawdBot, follow these steps: 1. Get a free server (e.g., Hetzner or AWS Free Tier) in about 5 minutes. 2. Install ClawdBot with a single command (about 2 minutes). 3. Run the wizard by following on-screen prompts (about 10 minutes). 4. Create a Telegram bot for secure connection (about 5 minutes). 5. Give it an identity by writing questions in Telegram (about 5 minutes).

name: To set up ClawdBot, follow these steps: 1. Get a free server (e.g., Hetzner or A
content: To set up ClawdBot, follow these steps: 1. Get a free server (e.g., Hetzner or AWS Free Tier) in about 5 minutes. 2. Install ClawdBot with a single command (about 2 minutes). 3. Run the wizard by following on-screen prompts (about 10 minutes). 4. Create a Telegram bot for secure connection (about 5 minutes). 5. Give it an identity by writing questions in Telegram (about 5 minutes).

payload.content: ClawdBot can assist in car negotiations by providing a direct gateway chat session to help secure deals, track details like MSRP, dealer discounts, adjusted price, APR, and down payment, and manage follow-up tasks like sending insurance information.
